description: Providing the stretch and comfort of a softshell with the protection of a hardshell. The perfect all-day layer, the new Kinetic 2.0 Jacket is a standout piece with a refined fit offering true multi-activity put-on-keep-on performance.
name: Rab Kinetic 2.0 Jacket - Mens

specs.key: 20 D Proflex™ 3-layer recycled polyester stretch knit face with PU membrane (118 g/m²) with Fluorocarbon-free DWR. HH
